title: Riding the Subway
summary: This book shows a day in Somi’s life as she rides the subway. It explains all the important steps from using a transport card to getting off, in a way children can easily understand.

texts: Today is the day Somi visits her aunt’s house.
To get there, she needs to take the subway.
Somi arrived at the subway station.
You need a transport card to ride the subway.
Somi took her transport card from her pocket and tapped it to enter.
She went down the stairs to the subway platform.
Now the train Somi is on starts moving.
The tunnels where the subway moves are very dark.
Sometimes the subway goes above ground.
Then you can see the world outside the windows.
It’s time to get off the subway.
Outside the station, Somi’s aunt was waiting for her.
Somi’s aunt’s dog, Bori, came to greet her.
Bori seemed happy to see Somi.
